answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Colin – I hope the following is helpful:
STANDARD IMAGE USAGE AGREEMENT
http://www.bigstockphoto.com/usage.html 
Seattle – Social Media Use Policy, including:
Acceptable Use of City Digital Equipment, Internet Access, Electronic Communications and Other Applications
Web Presentation and Accessibility Standards
Blogging Policy
Online Privacy and Security Policy
Policy on Non-Government Information and Links
Inclusive Outreach & Public Engagement Executive Order &Inclusive Public Engagement Policy
http://www.seattle.gov/pan/SocialMediaPolicy.htm 
WA University – Intellectual Property Policy
I.  Intellectual Property Policy 
II. Guidelines On Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer
III.    Useful Definitions in Discussions of Technology Management and Conflict of Interest
http://www.wustl.edu/policies/intelprop.html 
Springfield, MO - Web Site Policies Disclaimer, Linking, & Logo Use
http://www.springfieldmo.gov/help/weblegal.html 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Colin Walker
text:
I am looking for examples of agreements government entities have for licensing video/images/intellectual property for commercial use, along with associated licensing fees.  In particular, I am interested in agreements which provide for commercial use of government entity-owned images by third parties.
Thanks,
Colin Walker
Bellevue Parks & Community Services
425-452-7248
cwalker@bellevuewa.gov
title: Licensing of Images
